title: Cool Gaycake lettering
content:
This was posted on Yahoo News - a "Gaycake" a teenager baked to let her parents know something important.  
?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022063753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gayke2_4639.jpg)
  
I thought the hand lettering on the note (which matches the iced message) was unique, or maybe it resembles a font, or maybe it should be a font! It's kind of a unicase with no descenders. What do you think?
author: dinazina

comments.content: Laurel may have a great career in lettering ahead of her; OTOH, her cake-making skills could use some improvement…

But some other cake decorators are less skilled...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022063753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cake1_4701.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022063753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cake2_3847.jpg)
that's how a typical young female writes...
